de.tif.jacob.core.definition
Interface IAdhocBrowserDefinition

All Superinterfaces:
IBrowserDefinition, INamedObjectDefinition
public interface IAdhocBrowserDefinition
extends IBrowserDefinition

This interface represents an ad-hoc browser definition. In contrast to normal browser definition ad-hoc browser definition are mutual and not predefined at design-time. Ad-hoc browser definitions could be used to create dynamic result sets when performing a query on a table alias. To do something like that a corresponding IDataBrowser has to be requested by means of IDataAccessor.createBrowser(IAdhocBrowserDefinition).

getBrowserFields

java.util.List getBrowserFields()
Deprecated. use IBrowserDefinition.getBrowserField(int) and IBrowserDefinition.getFieldNumber() instead.

Returns the list of all browser fields.

Note: Browser fields are always of type IBrowserTableField

addBrowserField

void addBrowserField(java.lang.String tableAliasName,
                     java.lang.String tableFieldName,

                     SortOrder sortOrder)
                     throws java.lang.NoSuchFieldException
Deprecated. use addBrowserField(String, String, SortOrder, String) instead, which additionally returns a unique browser name

Adds a new browser table field to this browser definition, which will be appended to already existing browser fields.

Parameters:
tableAliasName - the name of the table alias
tableFieldName - the name of the table field
label - the label of the browser field
sortOrder - the sort order of the browser field
Throws:
java.lang.NoSuchFieldException - if no such table field exists for the given table alias

Adds a new browser table field to this browser definition, which will be appended to already existing browser fields.

Parameters:
tableAliasName - the name of the table alias
tableFieldName - the name of the table field
sortOrder - the sort order of the browser field
label - the label of the browser field
Returns:

Throws:
java.lang.NoSuchFieldException - if no such table field exists for the given table alias
Since:
